item.title: Evaluating Square Roots
item.description: The problem statement There is a LeetCode problem that asks you implement a sqrt function that returns the rounded-down nearest integer value. I am not aware, however, of a problem that asks you to simply reproduce the behavior of the standard library sqrt function.
